items.name: Action King
items.desc:
Action King / DIPA / 4 x 440ml / 8.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
This absolute unit; this Cadillac of DIPAs; this liquid training montage is hopped with Galaxy, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe until it bursts out of its tank top. Expect mango, pineapple, pomegranate and a big whack of dankness.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Freedom Vortex
items.desc:
Freedom Vortex / West Coast IPA / 4 x 440ml / 7.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Citra, Centennial and Columbus (name a more iconic trio we’ll wait) join forces for the Westie comeback tour. West Coast IPA just like mama used to make: blood orange, pine and grapefruit for days, with IBUs and whatnot.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Meanwhile Uptown
items.desc:
Meanwhile Uptown / NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 6.7% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Our first beer with Strata, plus Cryo Azacca and Cryo Citra. A high class NEIPA packing superlative tropical fruit flavours and a luxury-style texture.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: New World Helles Lager
items.desc:
Bass Strait/ New World Helles Lager / 4 x 440ml / 4.7% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Bass Strait is a New World Helles Lager, where the addition of Motueka hops from New Zealand add a gentle, floral fruitiness to the classically bready Helles texture and crisp finish.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Panic Kit
items.desc:
Panic Kit / Kveik NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 7.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Azacca? ✅ Cascade? ✅ Citra? ✅ Kveik Yeast? ✅ Our new Panic Kit NEIPA has everything you need. Bursting with danksplosions of grapefruit, orange and pineapple, delivered by the power of Kveik. Panic over!
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Park View
items.desc:
Park View / Summer Wit / 4 x 440ml / 4.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Park View, a super-quenching Summer Wit hopped with Mandarina Bavaria. Delicate notes of clementine and lemon in this ultra-pale, spritzy and aromatic Witbier are perfectly paired with sitting on a blanket.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Passionfruit Gose
items.desc:
Passionfruit Gose / Fruit Sour / 4 x 440ml / 4.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Tangy, tropical, tart and tasty. A light and snappy Gose-style sour beer, infused with passionfruit.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Super Chuck
items.desc:
Super Chuck / Summer Berry Kettle Sour / 4 x 440ml / 7.4% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Super Chuck is a 7.4% Summer Berry Kettle Sour using heavy-duty quantities of blackberry and blackcurrant with a little lemon. All the gloopberry sillyjam fun without the lactose – so it’s vegan friendly!
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: THE BIG JUICE 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE BIG JUICE 12 x 440ml Pack
This mixed case contains our biggest, juiciest DIPAs and NEIPAs, collected for your convenience in a 12 can pack. Beers included:
4 x ACTION KING – DIPA (GALAXY CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
This absolute unit; this Cadillac of DIPAs; this liquid training montage is hopped with Galaxy, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe until it bursts out of its tank top. Expect mango, pineapple, pomegranate and a big whack of dankness.
4 x VELVET SPOTLIGHT – DIPA (SABRO CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
Velvet Spotlight is our latest DIPA, packing in spectacular Sabro, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe. Big, sticky mango and pineapple vibes take centre stage, softened with a little coconut and lime.
4 x MEANWHILE UPTOWN – NEIPA (STRATA CRYO AZACCA CRYO CITRA) – 6.7% ABV
Our first beer with Strata, plus Cryo Azacca and Cryo Citra. A high class NEIPA packing superlative tropical fruit flavours and a luxury-style texture.

items.name: THE CROWD PLEASER 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE CROWD PLEASER 12 x 440ml Pack
This mixed case contains a selection to suit all tastes. Like breakfast cereal selection packs on your caravan holidays but without the Ricicles. Like a tin of sweets at Christmas with the weird ones taken out. Beers included:
3 x FLIPSIDE – DDH PALE ALE (NELSON AMARILLO CITRA) – 5.2% ABV
Flipside is a DDH Pale Ale hopped with Nelson, Amarillo and Citra. Tangy white grape notes offset the sharp citrus and sweet peach flavours in this extra pale, extra balanced, hazy crusher.
3 x PARK VIEW – SUMMER WITBIER (MANDARINA BAVARIA) – 4.5% ABV
Park View, a super-quenching Summer Wit hopped with Mandarina Bavaria. Delicate notes of clementine and lemon in this ultra-pale, spritzy and aromatic Witbier are perfectly paired with sitting on a blanket.
3 x FAMOUS BLUE CAGOULE – PALE ALE (NELSON CITRA) – 4.0% ABV
Famous Blue Cagoule is our highly practical Pale Ale for uncertain times and unpredictable weather. Citra and Nelson zip across the palate with those upbeat notes of grape and mango, and keep the finish nice and dry.
3 x BARLEYPOP – LITE LAGER – 4.4% ABV
POP-POP! Barleypop is our new 4.4% Lite Lager. Putting some polish on the well-worn everyday light lager, this is an extremely sunny beer designed for drinking with grass between your toes.

items.name: THE SESSION 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE SESSION 12 x 440ml Pack
This pack contains 12 cans of our latest, freshest, sessionable bangers. Beers included:
3 x FAMOUS BLUE CAGOULE – PALE ALE (NELSON CITRA) – 4.0% ABV
Famous Blue Cagoule is our highly practical Pale Ale for uncertain times and unpredictable weather. Citra and Nelson zip across the palate with those upbeat notes of grape and mango, and keep the finish nice and dry.
3 x SWITCH BACK – PALE ALE (CITRA MANDARINA BAVARIA AZACCA) – 4.5% ABV
A light and juicy Pale Ale hopped with Citra, Mandarina Bavaria and Azacca. Packed with resinous and zesty fruit notes at an easy-drinking strength.
3 x LONELY TOWN – SESSION IPA (CENTENNIAL IDAHO 7 CITRA) – 4.0% ABV
Feeling like a lonely walker on a lonely street? Take solace in this new Session IPA. Centennial, Idaho 7 and Citra walk hand-in-hand in this resinous, tropical treat.
3 x TROPICAL DELUXE – PALE ALE (CITRA MOSAIC SIMCOE) – 3.8% ABV
Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock.

items.name: THE SUPERIOR. LIQUID. GOODNESS. 16-Pack
items.desc:
PRE-ORDER: THE SUPERIOR. LIQUID. GOODNESS. 16 x 440ml Pack
This is a new, ultra-black-diamond-platinum selection of the best-of-the-best! We pick 16 cans of the month’s most exciting beers and ship them to you with some super-premium tasting notes, some extra Howling Hops goodies and all our love. If this proves popular we’ll turn this into a subscription!
This month’s box gives you early access to our first canned New England Triple IPA: Rooftops! We’re also including a special collaboration charcuterie with Crown & Queue: a pork snacking sausage made using Push Push DDH Pale! If you would prefer a vegan/vegetarian alternative in your box, please let us know in the order notes!
Shipping week commencing 12th October. Contents to include:
2x Rooftops – New England Triple IPA (Chinook Citra Sabro) – 9.5%
2x Scenes From The Lapse – Kveik DIPA (Citra Mosaic Strata) – 8.0%
2x Islands – NEIPA (Galaxy Mosaic) – 7.3%
2x Platform Contest – NEIPA (Topaz Citra Amarillo) – 6.5%
2x Heavy Operator – DDH Pale Ale (Sabro Citra Amarillo) – 5.6%
2x House IPA – NEIPA (Mosaic Motueka) – 6.9%
2x Panic Kit – Kveik NEIPA (Azacca Cascade Citra) – 7.0%
2x Pocketbook – DDH Pale Ale (Enigma Citra Chinook) – 5.2%
1x Crown & Queue ‘Pigtail’ snacking sausage – Push Push edition!
1x Tutored tasting sheet including recipe notes and pairing suggestions, plus some Howling Hops stickers and coasters!
IMPORTANT: please place any orders for additional products separately! Otherwise they will also be shipped w/c 12th October.

items.name: THE TOP TWELVE 12-Pack
items.desc:
THE TOP TWELVE 12 x 440ml Pack
A highly limited, always-evolving selection, packed with all of our latest and greatest. Each case of 12 cans will consist of 12 different beers. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
VELVET SPOTLIGHT – DIPA (SABRO CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
Velvet Spotlight is our latest DIPA, packing in spectacular Sabro, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe. Big, sticky mango and pineapple vibes take centre stage, softened with a little coconut and lime.
FREEDOM VORTEX – WEST COAST IPA (CITRA CENTENNIAL COLUMBUS) – 7.2% ABV
Citra, Centennial and Columbus (name a more iconic trio we’ll wait) join forces for the Westie comeback tour. West Coast IPA just like mama used to make: blood orange, pine and grapefruit for days, with IBUs and whatnot.
PANIC KIT – KVEIK NEIPA (AZACCA CASCADE CITRA) – 7.0% ABV
Azacca? ✅ Cascade? ✅ Citra? ✅ Kveik Yeast? ✅ Our new Panic Kit NEIPA has everything you need. Bursting with danksplosions of grapefruit, orange and pineapple, delivered by the power of Kveik. Panic over!
SUPER CHUCK – SUMMER BERRY SOUR – 7.4% ABV
Super Chuck uses heavy-duty quantities of blackberry and blackcurrant with a little lemon. All the gloopberry sillyjam fun without the lactose – so it’s vegan friendly!
CABIN FEVER – NEIPA (AZACCA TOPAZ CENTENNIAL) – 6.6% ABV
Once you’re shacked up with Azacca, Topaz and Centennial, you’ll never want to leave. Intense tropical fruit and citrus vibes climb the walls of this new 6.6% NEIPA.
MEANWHILE UPTOWN – NEIPA (CRYO AZACCA CRYO CITRA STRATA) – 6.7% ABV
Our first beer with Strata, plus Cryo Azacca and Cryo Citra. A high class NEIPA packing superlative tropical fruit flavours and a luxury-style texture.
TOP BUZZER – DDH PALE ALE (SIMCOE STRATA) – 5.6% ABV
Top Buzzer is penthouse-level juice. Simcoe and Strata in peak physical condition with that DDH smoothment. Popping with pineapple and peach at the push of a button.
LONELY TOWN – SESSION IPA (CENTENNIAL IDAHO 7 CITRA) – 4.0% ABV
Feeling like a lonely walker on a lonely street? Take solace in this new Session IPA. Centennial, Idaho 7 and Citra walk hand-in-hand in this resinous, tropical treat.
FAMOUS BLUE CAGOULE – PALE ALE (NELSON CITRA) – 4.0% ABV
Famous Blue Cagoule is our highly practical Pale Ale for uncertain times and unpredictable weather. Citra and Nelson zip across the palate with those upbeat notes of grape and mango, and keep the finish nice and dry.
PARK VIEW – SUMMER WIT (MANDARINA BAVARIA) – 4.5% ABV
Park View, a super-quenching Summer Wit hopped with Mandarina Bavaria. Delicate notes of clementine and lemon in this ultra-pale, spritzy and aromatic Witbier are perfectly paired with sitting on a blanket.
TROPICAL DELUXE – PALE ALE (CITRA SIMCOE MOSAIC) – 3.8% ABV
Tropical Deluxe is our core pale ale. Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock. Lower in alcohol, deluxer in tropical.
SCREWBALL – LEMON & LIME BERLINER WEISSE – 3.5% ABV
This tangy, tart lip-smacker is our latest fruited sour beer. Light in strength and sharp with snappy citrus, it’s an easy-drinking summer sour.
